languages.text: "Исследования Теодоры внесли в структуру тюрьмы Осколка нестабильность, мои же разработки усугубили ее. Когда частицы энергии К'тан просачиваются наружу, происходит масса интересных феноменов. Разрушение гробницы, искажения реальности... Когда я подчиню чудовище, я повелю ему прекратить расшатывать законы реальности".

"Theodora's research destabilised the Shard's prison, and my project only made it worse. Whenever particles of the C'tan Shard's energy seep out, many curious phenomena occur. The destruction of the crypt, the warped reality... When I tame the monster, I will order it to stop disrupting the laws of the universe."
languages.original_text: "Исследования Теодоры внесли в структуру тюрьмы Осколка нестабильность, мои же разработки усугубили ее. Когда частицы энергии К'тан просачиваются наружу, происходит масса интересных феноменов. Разрушение гробницы, искажения реальности... Когда я подчиню чудовище, я повелю ему прекратить расшатывать законы реальности".

traits.locale_text: "Theodora's research had made the Shard's structure unstable, with my development only making it worse. When the particles of C'Tan seep outside, many interesting phenomena occur. The destruction of the crypt, the reality distortions... When I tame the monster, I will order it to stop disrupting the laws of reality."

"Theodora's research had made the Shard's structure unstable, with my development only making it worse. When the particles of C'Tan seep outside, many interesting phenomena occur. The destruction of the crypt, the reality distortions... When I tame the monster, I will order it to stop disrupting the laws of reality."

"Theodora's research made the Shard's structure unstable, with my development only making it worse. When the particles of the C'Tan's energy seep outside, many interesting phenomena occur. The destruction of the crypt, the warped reality... When I tame the monster, I will order it to stop disrupting the laws of reality."

"Theodora's research made the Shard's structure unstable, with my development only making it worse. When the particles of the C'Tan's energy seep outside, many interesting phenomena occur. The destruction of the crypt, the warped reality... When I tame the monster, I will order it to stop disrupting the laws of reality."

"Theodora's research destabilised the Shard's prison, and my project only made it worse. Whenever particles of the C'tan's energy seep out, many curious phenomena occur. The destruction of the crypt, the warped reality... When I tame the monster, I will order it to stop disrupting the laws of the universe."

"Theodora's research destabilised the Shard's prison, and my project only made it worse. Whenever particles of the C'tan Shard's energy seep out, many curious phenomena occur. The destruction of the crypt, the warped reality... When I tame the monster, I will order it to stop disrupting the laws of the universe."

languages.text: « Les recherches de Théodora avaient déstabilisé la prison de l'Écharde et mes travaux n'ont fait qu'aggraver son état. Chaque fois que des particules d'énergie du C'tan s'échappent, beaucoup de phénomènes curieux se produisent. La destruction de la crypte, l'altération de la réalité... Lorsque j'aurai dompté le monstre, je lui ordonnerai de ne plus perturber les lois de l'univers. »
languages.original_text: "Theodora's research destabilised the Shard's prison, and my project only made it worse. Whenever particles of the C'tan Shard's energy seep out, many curious phenomena occur. The destruction of the crypt, the warped reality... When I tame the monster, I will order it to stop disrupting the laws of the universe."

traits.locale_text: « Les recherches de Théodora avaient rendu la prison de l'Écharde instable et mes travaux n'ont fait qu'aggraver les choses. Quand des particules d'énergie du C'tan s'échappent, beaucoup de phénomènes curieux se produisent. La destruction de la crypte, l'altération de la réalité... Lorsque j'aurai dompté le monstre, je lui ordonnerai de ne plus perturber les lois de l'univers. »

languages.text: «La investigación de Theodora desestabilizó la prisión del fragmento, y mi proyecto solo empeoró la situación. Cada vez que se filtran partículas de la energía del fragmento de C'tan, se producen fenómenos muy curiosos. La destrucción de la cripta, la realidad perturbada... Cuando dome al monstruo, le ordenaré que deje de interferir con las leyes del universo».
languages.original_text: "Theodora's research destabilised the Shard's prison, and my project only made it worse. Whenever particles of the C'tan Shard's energy seep out, many curious phenomena occur. The destruction of the crypt, the warped reality... When I tame the monster, I will order it to stop disrupting the laws of the universe."

traits.locale_text: «La investigación de Theodora desestabilizó la estructura del fragmento, y mi desarrollo solo empeoró la situación. Cuando las partículas de energía del C'Tan se filtran al exterior, se producen muchos fenómenos interesantes. La destrucción de la cripta, la realidad alterada... Cuando controle al monstruo, le ordenaré que deje de interferir con las leyes de la realidad».

languages.text: “西奥多拉的研究破坏了碎片牢狱的稳定性，而我的项目让它的情况变得更糟。当星神碎片的能量粒子向外界渗透时，会发生很多有趣的现象，包括墓穴毁灭、现实扭曲等等……不过，等我驯服了那头怪物之后，我就会阻止它破坏宇宙的法则。”
languages.original_text: "Theodora's research destabilised the Shard's prison, and my project only made it worse. Whenever particles of the C'tan Shard's energy seep out, many curious phenomena occur. The destruction of the crypt, the warped reality... When I tame the monster, I will order it to stop disrupting the laws of the universe."

traits.locale_text: “西奥多拉的研究让那块碎片结构变得不在稳定，而我后续的研究仅仅让它的情况变得更糟。当星神的能量粒子向外界渗透时，会发生很多有趣的现象，包括墓穴毁灭、现实扭曲等等……不过，等我驯服了那头怪物之后，我就会阻止它继续破坏现实世界的法则。”

languages.text: "Theodoras Forschungen haben das Fragmentgefängnis destabilisiert, und mein Projekt hat es nur noch schlimmer gemacht. Wenn Partikel der Energie des C'tan-Fragments hinaussickern, treten viele sonderbare Phänomene auf. Die Zerstörung der Krypta, die verzerrte Realität ... Wenn ich das Monster zähme, befehle ich ihm, die Gesetze des Universums nicht weiter zu stören."
languages.original_text: "Theodora's research destabilised the Shard's prison, and my project only made it worse. Whenever particles of the C'tan Shard's energy seep out, many curious phenomena occur. The destruction of the crypt, the warped reality... When I tame the monster, I will order it to stop disrupting the laws of the universe."

traits.locale_text: "Theodoras Forschungen haben die Struktur des Fragments instabil werden lassen, meine Entwicklung hat es nur noch schlimmer gemacht. Wenn die Partikel der Energie des C'tan hinaussickern, kommt es zu vielen interessanten Phänomen. Die Zerstörung der Krypta, die verzerrte Realität ... Wenn ich das Monster zähme, befehle ich ihm, die Störung der Gesetze der Realität einzustellen."

languages.text: 「テオドラの研究がシャードの構造を不安定にし、私の開発はそれを悪化させた。ク＝タン・シャードのエネルギーの粒子が外部に浸透すると、多くの興味深い現象が起こるのだ。地下墓地の破壊、歪んだ現実…私がこの怪物を手なずけたら、現実の法則を乱すのを止めるよう命じるだろう」
languages.original_text: "Theodora's research destabilised the Shard's prison, and my project only made it worse. Whenever particles of the C'tan Shard's energy seep out, many curious phenomena occur. The destruction of the crypt, the warped reality... When I tame the monster, I will order it to stop disrupting the laws of the universe."

traits.locale_text: 「テオドラの研究がシャードの構造を不安定にした。私の開発は、それを悪化させただけだ。ク＝タンのエネルギーの粒子が外部に浸透すると、多くの興味深い現象が起こるのだ。地下墓地の破壊、歪んだ現実…私がこの怪物を手なずけたら、現実の法則を乱すのを止めるよう命じるだろう」

languages.text: "Theodora'nın araştırmaları, Parça'nın zindanını istikrarsız bir hâle getirdi; projem de işleri daha kötü bir duruma soktu. C'tan Parçası'nın enerji zerreleri her sızdığında birçok ilginç fenomen gerçekleşiyor. Mahzenin yıkılması, çarpık gerçeklik gibi... Canavarı ehlîleştirdiğimde ona evrenin kurallarını bozmamasını emredeceğim."
languages.original_text: "Theodora's research destabilised the Shard's prison, and my project only made it worse. Whenever particles of the C'tan Shard's energy seep out, many curious phenomena occur. The destruction of the crypt, the warped reality... When I tame the monster, I will order it to stop disrupting the laws of the universe."
